title: Turkey and red wine casserole
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons plain white flour', 'Salt and black pepper', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) turkey steaks', '2 rashers back bacon, rind cut off', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '250 g (9 oz) baby carrots', '1 stick celery, chopped', '250 g (9 oz) button mushrooms', '250 g (9 oz) shallots, left whole', '750 ml (1 pint 7 fl oz) light red wine', '600-700 ml (1 pint-1 pint 5 fl oz) chicken stock', '4 large cloves garlic, chopped', '1 large bouquet garni, or 4 sprigs of fresh parsley or thyme and 1 bay leaf tied together', 'To garnish: sprigs of fresh chervil or parsley']
